title: UN urgently appeals for $86 million to tackle food insecurity in Zimbabwe (UN - United ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 12 October 2015 - The United Nations in Zimbabwe has appealed to humanitarian and development partners for $86 million that is critically needed to fill a shortfall to support 1.5 million people affected by
